titleStmt.title: The true fourme and shape of a monsterous chyld, whiche was borne in Stony Stratforde, in North Hampton shire The yeare of our Lord, M.CCCCC.LXV.
titleStmt.author: Elderton, William, d. 1592?

publicationStmt.publisher: In Fletestrete beneath the Conduit: at the signe of S. Iohn Euangelist, by Thomas Colwell,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: the signe of S. Iohn Euangelist
